note.p: German teacher, historian, and geographer. Studied philology at Halle, Greifswald, and Berlin. Received his doctorate from Halle, 1858. Taught in various schools until 1860; keeper at the university library at Greifswald, 1860â€“6. Lecturer, then professor and senior teacher at the Luisenstadt Oberrealschule until at least 1897. Wrote on prehistoric culture and the customs of the people of European lake-dwellings.
